title: How to raise FPS
body: I randomly dropped to like 1-7 FPS and I can't even play games anymore, anyone know a way to help raise it? All my graphics are the lowest they go and I used to be a smooth 40-60 FPS.

replies.body:
FPS problems are typically the result of a problematic display driver or improper windows power settings. As a first step, I recommend working through the solutions in our [FPS troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)

Let me know if those changes resolved the issue.
